title: A Mi Luo Ge Hai Qi Yuan
synopsis: Ami Luo, a 6-year-old Zhuang girl, travels with her parents to Yufeng Mountain, the hometown of Liu Sanjie. Under the guidance of the mysterious nature, Amiruo accidentally awakened the magic flute spirit that had been sleeping for a thousand years and became its new owner. The magic flute spirit passed the sapphire hydrangea passed down by the third sister Liu to the new owner Ami Luo. After the evil night elf king learned that the new owner of the sapphire hydrangea had appeared, he sent his subordinate Xiao Hei to lure Amilo and his party into the fairy kingdom. In the ancient city of the Elf Kingdom, Amiluo and his party teamed up with the Elf Queen and Elf Princess to defeat the evil night elf king. (translated from iqiyi)

Sequel.name: A Mi Luo Zhi Kongzhong Dalu
